issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
During a KS nook pass on v8 and Rhino on the Nook, I noticed that the rhino compile loaded the desktop google site, while the v8 compile loaded the mobile google site.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS nook with SDK 1.8.0.1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Web Views>External URL

Result:
Desktop site loaded

Expected:
Mobile site loaded

Notes:
The Base UI>Views>Web Views>XHR to Filesystem test loads the mobile site
fields.summary: Android: html - rhino - Nook on rhino loads desktop google site while v8 loads mobile
fields.environment:
NookColor: 2.2.1
SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111216124633
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112152014
Mac OS 10.7.2

comments.body: Wonder if the userAgent is different between the two.
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
